```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
datafest <- mini_clicks
```

```{r,message=FALSE}

datafest1 <- datafest %>%
  mutate(new_date_time = ydm_hms(date_time),
         srch_checkin = ydm(srch_ci),
         srch_co = ydm(srch_co)) %>%
  select(date_time,
         user_location_country, 
         user_location_city,
         user_location_region,
         orig_destination_distance,
         srch_destination_id,
         is_package, 
         srch_ci, 
         srch_co,
         is_booking) %>%
 filter(is_booking =='1') 

datafest2 <- datafest1 %>%
  inner_join(destinations, by = "srch_destination_id")

```
